reporter_caption.center: JANSEN v. COM., DEPT. OF TRANSP., 576 Pa. 716 (2003)

caption.center: FREDERICK JANSEN, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH, DEPARTMENT OF
TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING Respondent.

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Middle District.

opinion.posture: No. 503 MAL 2003, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Commonwealth Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 8th day of December, 2003, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED.
